summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2014 CHEVROLET VOLT. WHILE DRIVING 65 MPH, THE PROPULSION POWER REDUCED WARNING INDICATOR ILLUMINATED AND THE VEHICLE DECELERATED TO 35 MPH. THE VEHICLE WAS PULLED OFF THE ROAD AND THE BATTERY DIED. THE VEHICLE WAS TOWED TO MIAMI LAKES AUTO MALL (16600 NW 57TH AVE, MIAMI LAKES, FL 33014, (305) 455-3540) WHERE IT WAS DIAGNOSED THAT THE SOFTWARE TO THE PROPULSION SYSTEM NEED TO BE UPDATED. THE SOFTWARE UPDATE WAS PERFORMED, BUT THE FAILURE RECURRED THREE TIMES. THE MANUFACTURER WAS NOTIFIED. THE APPROXIMATE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS 53,016.
